passives.name: Harmony
passives.effects: Grants {{as|heal and shield power}} equal to {{as|{{fd|0.5}}% '''bonus''' mana}}.

passives.name: Manaflow
passives.effects: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 5 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge to grant {{as|4 '''bonus''' mana}}, increased to {{as|8|mana}} if they are a champion, up to a '''maximum''' of {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.
Transforms into {{ii|Diadem of Songs}} at {{as|360 '''bonus''' mana}}.
